Title: Before Brazil and Elon Musk: X’s history of run-ins with left and right

Title: Video shows drone attack hit apartment building in Russia
Description: This is the moment a drone attack hit a residential building in Russia.

Title: Israeli attack on Gaza tent camp leaves vast crater
Description: This vast crater was the result of an Israeli air attack on Gaza’s al-Mawasi camp which killed dozens of people.

Title: China, Russia to conduct joint naval and air drills this month
Description: The Northern United-2024 exercises will take place in the Sea of Japan and the Sea of Okhotsk.

Title: Israeli attack on Gaza displacement camp kills dozens
Description: Israel’s military has bombed the al-Mawasi camp in southern Gaza near Khan Younis, killing more than 40 people.

Title: Jordan elections: How will electoral reforms impact the September 10 polls?
Description: The reforms are part of a decade-long democratisation process in which political parties will play a larger role.

Title: Hasina’s gone, but fate of Bangladesh’s forcibly disappeared uncertain
Description: Only three of more than 150 persons who went missing during Sheikh Hasina's long rule have been reunited with families.

Title: One killed near Moscow as more than 140 Ukrainian drones target Russia
Description: Russia says it shot down 144 Ukrainian drones overnight, 20 of them over the Moscow region.

Title: Australia says it will ban minors from using social media
Description: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese says he wants children 'off their phones and on the footy field'.

Title: James Earl Jones, actor and voice of Darth Vader, has died aged 93
Description: Born in poverty in segregated Mississippi, Jones went on to become one of the world's most celebrated actors.

Title: Harvey Weinstein undergoes emergency heart surgery, representatives say
Description: Producer's hospitalisation comes as he awaits a new trial after a court quashed his sex crime convictions in New York.

Description: As the war enters its 928th day, these are the main developments.

Title: At least 19 reported dead in Israeli strike on Gaza’s al-Mawasi ‘safe zone’
Description: Officials say number of victims still to be recovered from Gaza tent camp for displaced Palestinians.

Title: US authorities charge two men for encouraging racist attacks on Telegram
Description: The US Justice Department says the suspects led a 'transnational terrorist group' to solicit hate crimes.

Title: Google faces US antitrust lawsuit over ad tech
Description: US DOJ and several states say in a lawsuit that Google holds a monopoly over online advertising technology.

Title: Who will protect civilians in war-torn Sudan?
Description: United Nations experts say serious human rights violations have been commited by both sides in the war.
